Show Monitors had to be on for this to happen.

Fixed. When children are "reset" for a parent, the widgets get remapped to the new model elements. If we attempt to select a model element that is no longer mapped to a widget (because it has been pushed down the widget stack), it can result in an NPE. 

Fix is to abort the selection attempt.
